That is very interesting Bruce. 
 
Gab
 
 
In a message dated 1/19/2008 11:23:18 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
paranormalinvestigating@... writes:

 
 
 
Gab,

I have never personally recieved a future prediction  other than them telling 
me the phone will ring or that I will recieve a  call or similar things.

From what I can gather they have certain  rules that they must follow as far 
as what they can relay in communication  with us. I assume the reason for 
this is 
that if they do give us a  prediction of the future and we even attempt to 
act upon it
that may cause  us to adversly alter the events that would or should take  
place.

I believe they call it the butterfly  effect.

Bruce



Bruce Halliday 

 (http://free-paranormalinvestigating.com/</div></div><p%20/><div%20class=) 


 
____________________________________
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups 
From: eparanormal@From: e
Date:  Sat, 19 Jan 2008 13:10:45 +0000
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Bruce


 
I listened to your Frak Box files this morning. You ask  the tech 
question on 2008. They said they didn't know. Have they ever  given you 
a future prediction say a year or two  away?

Gab
